# tintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color for the refresh control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tintColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `nil`.

## Accessing the control attributes

- **attributedTitle**: The styled title text to display in the refresh control.
